function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low flexibility and storage in hospitals due to domestic hot water, needing more focus.","Impact":"Decreased ability to adapt to changing needs and store resources.","Mitigation":"Implement better hot water storage systems and flexible infrastructure design.","Technologies":"Advanced hot water storage systems, smart building controls.","People":"Staff, patients, visitors at hospitals and healthcare buildings.","Owner":"Facility management, building designers, and policymakers."},{"Description":"Legislative constraint of water storage due to legionella bacteria.","Impact":"Risk of legionella bacterial contamination in water supply.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to legislation, implementation of water treatment measures.","Technologies":"Legionella monitoring systems, water treatment facilities.","People":"Staff, patients, visitors at hospitals and healthcare buildings.","Owner":"Facility management, building designers, and policymakers."},{"Description":"Lower initial level of building automation and control in Case A, leading to a larger increase in points accumulation.","Impact":"Potential inefficiencies and limitations in building automation and control.","Mitigation":"Upgrade building automation and control systems to improve efficiency.","Technologies":"Smart sensors, IoT devices, building automation software.","People":"Building occupants, facility management.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management."}]}
